pred: Repairing tires is not an easy task, as it requires precision and attention to detail. In the video, a man is seen using a machine to repair a tire on a tractor. The machine is designed to remove the tire and place it back on the tractor, making the process more efficient and accurate. The man is seen carefully placing the tire back on the tractor, ensuring that it is properly aligned and secure. This demonstrates the importance of proper maintenance and repair of tires to ensure the safety and functionality of the tractor.
